```
     apiVersion: v1
    kind: Pod
    metadata:
      name: unmasked-procmount
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: mycontainer
        image: myimage
        securityContext:
          procMount: Unmasked
    ```

```
     apiVersion: v1
    kind: Pod
    metadata:
      name: non-root-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: mycontainer
        image: myimage
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 1000
          runAsGroup: 3000
    ```

```
     apiVersion: v1
    kind: Pod
    metadata:
      name: restricted-capabilities
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: mycontainer
        image: myimage
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop: [«ALL»]
            add: [«NET_BIND_SERVICE»]
    ```
